result.name: benthic-faunal-biomass-with-environmental-data-celtic-seas1
result.notes:
Abundance and biomass of each log2 weight class for each species in each 
sample, standardised to area of seabed sampled. Includes sample locations, 
sampling gear used, biological and behavioural trait information for each 
taxon, measured environmental variables for water column and sediment, remote 
sensed chlorophyll and fishing effort data (Vessel Monitoring Systems, VMS) 
for each location.

organization.name: marine-environmental-data-information-network
organization.title: Marine Environmental Data & Information Network
organization.description: MEDIN is a partnership of UK organisations committed to improving access to marine data. Our partners are both public and private sector.

result.title: Benthic faunal biomass with environmental data, Celtic Seas

resources.description: The Cefas Data Portal contains metadata records and data sets available to download and connect to in support of our commitment to open science. Data is available in the following formats: CSV.
